name: Graph-based-semi-supervised-learning
tagline: Graph construction of a dataset, Semi Supervised Learning, Label Propogation, Mahalanobis Distance
body:
This project explores the different techniques (both scalable and non scalable) for Graph based semi supervised learning. Recent techniques such as ITML and LMNN along with a few others are empirically evaluated on the 20 newsgroups dataset.
![](https://github.com/deerishi/graph-based-semi-supervised-learning/blob/master/graph.png?raw=True)
